583c3951-20a7-4184-8765-83dbd4858d0a:
Choose a {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g}. Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast of that school are more difficult to resist.
Benefit: Add +1 to the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}Difficulty Class{/g} for all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against spells from the school of magic you select.
Special: You can gain this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a new school of magic.
6cb7db60-215a-47e3-8c7c-ece127c7b460:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} of a certain element are more difficult to resist.
Benefit: Choose one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, or fire). Add +1 to the {g|Encyclopedia:DC}Difficulty Class{/g} for all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against spells that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of the energy type you select.
